Chi is a researcher at the Norwegian Institute of Public Health (Folkehelseinstituttet). She is a statistician and R programmer at [Sykdomspulsen](https://docs.sykdomspulsen.no), a real-time analysis and public health surveillance system.

Chi has recently earned her PhD at University of Oslo. Her thesis is *Representation and utilization of hospital Electronic Health Records data*.

Chi also has a 20% position as a statistical advisor at the Oslo Centre for Biostatistics and Epidemiology ([OCBE](https://www.med.uio.no/imb/english/research/centres/ocbe/)).
:::
